post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
These are the famous quote I share with my team member weekly base
March “ Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.” - Leo Tolstoy
April “laughter is the best medicine – unknown”
“You can’t win an argument – Dale Carnegie”
“ When you smile, whole world, it smiles with you" – commercial
May “"Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful." -Joshua J. Marine
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." - Eleanor Roosevelt
"It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself." - Eleanor Roosevelt
"My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you’ll be happy; if not, you’ll become a philosopher." -Socrates
“It's no the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.” - Commercial
June "I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that don’t work." -Thomas Alva Edison
No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit." -Helen Keller
July "Work is the true elixir of life. The busiest man is the happiest man." -Sir Theodore Martin
"A person with the right ATTITUDE is always a WINNER." Spencer Hwang
"When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?" -Sydney Harris
August "If you want to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first create the universe." - Carl Sagan
“The only thing we have to fear is fear itself." -Franklin D. Roosevelt, First inaugural address
“Change what you can. Accept what you can’t change. Ask for wisdom to tell what they are." -Prayer of St. Francis
Do you have any quotes like to share ?
post.title: Quote of the Week
